alert.note: Alert for Panola; Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yalobusha, northeastern Tallahatchie and south central Panola Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paynes, or 8 miles south of Charleston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, George Payne State Park, Enid, Paynes, Oakland, Distall, Leverett, Cascilla, Tippo, Effie, Tillatoba and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
